item.title: Roblox: Blox Fruits Codes (December 2024)
item.description:
Quick Links

  • All Blox Fruits Codes
  • How to Redeem Codes for Blox Fruits
  • How to Play Blox Fruits
  • The Best Roblox Adventure Games Like Blox Fruits

Summary

  • Roblox players can redeem Blox Fruits codes to get in-game rewards like double XP and free stat resets.
  • New Blox Fruits codes are rare these days, but there are still plenty of working codes available for new players.
  • All of the Blox Fruits codes listed below are checked regularly to make sure that they're still active.

When it comes to Roblox games that were inspired by fan-favorite anime series, they don't come much bigger than Blox Fruits . It regularly has more than three-quarters of a million active players and has racked up more than 33 billion visits since its launch in early 2019. It's a must-play for anyone craving a life of adventure, particularly those who also happen to enjoy games like One Piece ​​​​​​.

Much of the game's success can be attributed to the tireless work of the developers, who are constantly adding innovative new features and mechanics for Roblox players to enjoy. They also release new Blox Fruits codes from time to time, which fans of the game can redeem to receive XP boosts, stat resets, and a bunch of other fantastic in-game goodies.

Updated December 21, 2024, by Tom Bowen: Although there were one or two early teething problems, the Dragon Rework update seems to have gone down pretty well with players for the most part. However, the lack of any new Blox Fruits codes to mark the occasion remains a source of contention for some, with the last working codes for Blox Fruits coming several months ago now. However, with Christmas right around the corner, many are hoping for a festive surprise; either in the form of double XP or a new stat refund code. To avoid missing out if and when new codes are added, it's a good idea to bookmark this page and check back here often, as new Blox Fruits codes are added to the table below on a regular basis.

  • STAFFBATTLE – Redeem for 2x Experience
  • JULYUPDATE_RESET – Redeem for Stat Reset

How to Redeem Codes for Blox Fruits

When it comes to redeeming codes for Blox Fruit , there are a few simple steps to follow that will be listed below. If, for some reason, a code does not work, players should be sure to check to see if the code has been entered correctly . If the code still doesn't work, this may mean that it has recently expired or has already been redeemed.

  1. Launch Blox Fruits.
  2. Click on the blue and white gift icon on the left side of the screen.
  3. Enter a code from our list of active Blox Fruits codes.
  4. Press the Redeem! button.

How to Play Blox Fruits

First, players must choose either the Marines or Pirates faction. Then, players have to take quests to get XP and Beli, the local currency. For Beli, players can buy swords, guns, Blox Fruits that give skills, and, most importantly, boats. With these boats, players can travel to other islands and find the best vendors and strong bosses. Also, starting from level 20, players can engage in PvP between factions.

The Best Roblox Adventure Games Like Blox Fruits

Playing the same game can often get a little boring, leaving some players craving something new. For those who find themselves in that position, these popular Roblox games like Blox Fruits should definitely help to scratch that itch:

  • Anime Roulette
  • Your Bizarre Adventure
  • Dragon Adventures
  • A One Piece Game
  • Anime Souls Simulator

FAQ

Q: What is the newest code in Blox Fruits?

The newest Blox Fruits code is WildDares , which can be redeemed for twenty minutes of double XP.

item.title: Dragon Age: The Veilguard - 7 Best Weapons For Veil Rangers
item.description:
Summary

  • The Veil Ranger in Dragon Age: The Veilguard focuses on Ranged attacks, needing strong weapons like the Golden Grassblade and Storm Needle.
  • The Glory Hunter's Bow and Dragon's War Bow are ideal for increasing Ranged damage and adding Fire and Electric elements for Veil Rangers.
  • Close combat options like the Cutthroat's Sword and Focal Blade offer Precision and high Stagger for players who need to engage in melee combat.

In Dragon Age: The Veilguard , players can choose between three classes: the Rogue, the Warrior, and the Mage. For those who choose the Rogue, there are three Specializations, each with their unique attributes. The Veil Ranger is one of these Specializations that focuses on Ranged attacks.

While this option doesn't offer much mobility, its long-range damage is what sets it apart. To ensure players get the most from this feature, they need the best weapons for the Veil Ranger. Strong Bows are a must, but for those times when they need to get up close and personal with their enemies, it's also important to have solid main-hand and off-hand weapons.

1 Golden Grassblade

A Great Defensive Boost

  • Uncommon : increases Defense by +30
  • Rare : incoming damage is reduced by 5% for each missing arrow for a maximum of 25% reduction
  • Epic : weapon attacks are increased by 10% of Rook's Defense as bonus damage
  • Legendary : Defense is increased by +20 per each active Advantage

The Veil Ranger does their best work from a distance, so when they have to fight at close quarters, they need all the help they can get. The Golden Grassblade is an ideal weapon choice, especially during the early game, because of its effective boost to Rook's Defense.

As this weapon's perks are unlocked, players will enjoy even more Defensive boosts. They can find the Golden Grassblade in chests throughout Arlathan Forest. It can later be purchased from the Veil Jumpers Faction Vendor once it reaches Rank 4.

2 Storm Needle

Enhanced Critical Damage

  • Uncommon : Penetration increases by +20%
  • Rare : Critical vs. enemies with high health
  • Epic : Melee Critical strikes disregard the enemy's Defense
  • Legendary : Melee Critical hits cause 30% of the damage to be dealt in the area around the target

For players looking to deal extra damage, the Storm Needle is a great choice. It delivers awesome Physical damage and high Stagger for any time players need to engage in close combat. As its perks are unlocked, Penetration and the effects of Critical Damage will increase.

This weapon can be purchased from the Veil Jumpers Faction Shop at Rank 1. It can also be found during the "In Entropy's Grasp" quest in a marked chest. Other copies can be found in the Crossroads in the Converged City, in Arlathan Forest, and during the "House of the Dead" quest.

3 Glory Hunter's Bow

Increased Ranged Damage

  • Uncommon : Charged Attack increases by +20%
  • Rare : Enemies 20 or more meters away suffer +20% damage
  • Epic : Weakpoint hits at 20 or more meters away deal 50% of one's Critical damage as additional Weakpoint damage
  • Legendary : +100% Weapon damage for Ranged companions

The Veil Ranger is all about Ranged attacks, and this weapon is perfect for enhancing them. The Glory Hunter's Bow offers decent Physical damage and Stagger, but its real benefits come from its unlocked perks. Once it reaches Rare and Epic statuses, players will enjoy greater damage against long-distance enemies and increased Weakpoint damage.

Players can obtain this Bow as an automatic reward once completing the quest "On Blighted Wings." It's also accessible in chests found during the "Isle of Gods," "Blood of Arlathan," and "The Wolf's Call" quests.

4 Dragon's War Bow

Fire And Electric Damage

  • Uncommon : Fire Resistance is increased by 15%
  • Rare : bonus Electric damage is applied to weapon damage
  • Epic : when enemies are Shocked, Weakpoint hits inflict Burning
  • Legendary : when Burning is applied, the target's Electric Resistance and Fire Resistance are decreased by 10% per stack

Veil Rangers work best from a distance, and anything that boosts Electric damage is a viable option. The Dragon's War Bow applies both Fire and Electric damage based on its rarity level. It also deals a good bit of Stagger, making it a well-rounded choice for starting out.

This weapon can be found in a chest during "The Warden's Vault" quest. It can also be purchased from the Shadow Dragons Faction Shop once it reaches Rank 4 or Alis in Dock Town.

5 Cutthroat's Sword

Enhanced Precision

  • Uncommon : Critical damage is increased by +20%
  • Rare : When Rook executes a perfect dodge, they gain Precision
  • Epic : Precision effectiveness is increased by +10%
  • Legendary : when Precision is active, Rook gains 25% Penetration

In close combat, players need every hit to count, especially when their protagonist is primarily a Ranged fighter. The Cutthroat's Sword is perfect for enhancing close-quarters fighting by increasing Rook's Precision. This ensures players will get off more Critical hits for maximum damage.

They can find this weapon at the Rank 2 Grey Wardens Faction Shop. It's also available during several quests, including "A Warden's Best Friend," "Something Wrong," "The Siege of Weisshaupt," and "Something's Coming."

6 Focal Blade

High Physical Damage And Stagger

  • Uncommon : Electric damage is increased by +40
  • Rare : Final Attacks have an added +100 Electric damage
  • Epic : Shocked is applied on Final Attacks
  • Legendary : Shocked status reduces an enemy's Electric Resistance by 25

When players need to engage in melee combat, they'll need the best weapons for the Veil Ranger. The Focal Blade offers some serious Physical damage and high Stagger, making it a phenomenal choice even as a Common weapon. However, once its perks begin to unlock, it also becomes a formidable source of Electric damage, making it perfect for this Rogue Specialization.

Players can find this Bow during the quest "Pinnacle of Its Kind" when fighting the iteration of The Formless One in the Mossberg Wetlands. It can also be found during the quests "The Demon's Bargain" and "The Blood of Arlathan" in chests.

7 Dauntless Greatbow

Great For High Electric Damage

  • Uncommon : Rook deals an added +40 Electric damage
  • Rare : Electric damage is increased by +15%
  • Epic : Electric damage is increased by 10% for each remaining arrow
  • Legendary : when an enemy with 3 or more Shocked stacks receives a Weakpoint hit, lightning will chain nearby enemies

To maximize Electric damage, players should pick up the Dauntless Greatbow. This weapon offers decent Physical damage and Stagger, but its real benefits come from unlocking its perks. Each level of rarity grants Rook increased Electric damage, making them a serious long-range danger.

This Bow can be found at the Rank 3 Veil Jumpers Faction Shop. During the quest "Loyal Friends," an enemy specific to the quest will also drop a chest with this Bow inside. Another copy is available after completing the quest "Disrupt and Conquer" and a final one in Arlathan Forest in a chest.

item.title: Animal Crossing: Pocket Camp Complete - How to Get Fertilizer
item.description:
Quick Links

  • Where to Get Fertilizer
    • How to Use Gulliver's Ship
  • How to Use Fertilizer
    • Every Fruit Tree Location in Pocket Camp Complete

Not to be confused with Flower Food, Fertilizer is an item in Animal Crossing: Pocket Camp Complete that can be used to instantly "grow" fruit on fruit trees. Fertilizer can be useful if you have animal requests that require fruit, but the fruit trees in Pocket Camp Complete still need an hour or more to grow. On the downside, Fertilizer is a much rarer item than your collectibles and crafting materials, so you should use it only when you really need it.

Where to Get Fertilizer

How to Use Gulliver's Ship

The free way to get Fertilizer in Pocket Camp Complete is to complete the Daily Goals every Monday. When you complete all four Daily Goals, you'll get x1 bag of Fertilizer. Here are the daily tasks for Monday:

  • Pick up a *fruit (ex: pear, orange)
  • Harvest 3 fruits
  • Pick up 5 fruits
  • Complete 5 requests for visiting animals

* The fruit mentioned in the daily goals are non-local fruit such as apples, pears, and peaches. Your required fruit may be different from another player.

You also have a chance of getting Fertilizer from golden balloon gifts that appear on the map.

If you've been using Gulliver's Ship, you may have noticed an island called Fructose Island. It requires 600 points of cargo and takes 2 hours of travel. Fructose Island offers 3 souvenirs, one of which is x3 Fertilizer . When you've completed Fructose Island, you'll get a another x3 Fertilizer as a Completion Bonus.

Gulliver's Ship can take the following export items to Fructose island:

Item

Points

Plain Package

30

Pear

50

Peach

50

Cherry

50

Perfect Peach

100

Perfect Pear

100

Perfect Cherry

100

Golden Package

600

How to Use Fertilizer

Every Fruit Tree Location in Pocket Camp Complete

So long as there is no fruit on a tree, you can use Fertilizer to regrow fruit. Tap the Fertilizer icon above a tree, and select yes. This will cause the fruit of the respective tree to grow back immediately. Using Fertilizer will not increase the number of fruits, as you'll only be able to get three, just as you would normally.

If you tap on a tree without any Fertilizer, you'll be asked to spend Leaf Tokens instead.

  • Fruit trees, including your local fruit tree, grow in Breezy Hollow or Lost Lure Creek.
  • Coconut Trees grow on Sunburst Island and Saltwater Shores.

Peach, Cherry, Apple, Pear, and Orange fruit are all considered "common" fruit. This means every player will see these fruit trees at Breezy Hollow or Lost Lure Creek. Grapes, Lychee Berries, and Lemons are considered "local" fruit. Depending on your version of Pocket Camp Complete , one of the trees in Breezy Hollow and Lost Lure Creek will be one of the three local fruits. You can't get non-local fruit unless you're given it as a gift from a camper at Whistle Pass.

item.title: Fatal Fury: City of the Wolves Reveals New Playable Character
item.description:
Summary

  • Gato is the newest confirmed character in Fatal Fury: City of the Wolves, bringing unique fighting skills.
  • The game marks the return of Fatal Fury after 26 years and adopts a unique art style and REV system.
  • Besides fan-favorite characters, SNK reveals collaborations and promises more surprises in the 2025 game.

In the build-up to its highly anticipated release, Fatal Fury: City of the Wolves has revealed Gato as the latest playable character to be confirmed for the game. Developed by SNK, Fatal Fury: City of the Wolves marks the return of one of the oldest popular fighting game IPs in the world, with the series having been kicked off in 1991 with Fatal Fury: King of the Fighters .

Back in 2022, SNK announced that a Fatal Fury sequel was in development, filling longtime fans with excitement. After around 26 years, Fatal Fury: City of the Wolves is set to mark the franchise's return on April 24, 2025, on PS5, PS4, Xbox Series X/S, and PC. The fighting game will continue the story of the preceding entry in the series, 1999's Garou: Mark of the Wolves . Over recent months, various fighters—such as Kim Dong Hwan and Mai Shiranui—have been revealed to be part of the forthcoming Fatal Fury game's roster.

In a recently released trailer for Fatal Fury: City of the Wolves , Gato has been announced as the newest confirmed addition to the game's growing catalog of fighters. Starting from quick strikes to theatrical finishers, the clip shows the various moves that the martial artist is set to bring to the game. Voiced by Cory Yee, Gato can be seen wearing a traditional-looking black robe along with dark green pants throughout the video, which is also close to what fans have come to expect based on the character's past iterations. Joining the lineup in City of the Wolves makes him yet another martial artist in the new Fatal Fury besides Hotaru Futaba.

Fatal Fury: City of the Wolves Announces New Addition to Roster

Gato gets a grand arrival on Fatal Fury: City of the Wolves 's roster, thanks to receiving his own trailer for the game. The returning Fatal Fury character, who first appeared in Garou: Mark of the Wolves , is depicted as a vengeful combatant who fights his enemies with his eyes closed in order to sharpen his other senses and movement. Interestingly, Gato has appeared on multiple occasions in SNK's Fatal Fury and The King of Fighters franchises.

Besides incorporating fan-favorite characters into the new Fatal Fury , SNK has also worked on a certain unexpected collaboration as of late. One of its recent team-ups involved a renowned footballer bringing his likeness to Fatal Fury: City of the Wolves . With some more time to go before the fighting title's launch, it will be interesting to see if the Japanese studio announces more characters coming to the 2025 game.

item.title: Roblox: Death Ball Codes (December 2024)
item.description:
Quick Links

  • All Death Ball Codes
  • How to Redeem Codes for Death Ball
  • Where to Find More Death Ball Codes

It's often said that imitation is the sincerest form of flattery, in which case, the developers of Death Ball must really like Blade Ball . The two games are incredibly similar, although many Roblox players now seem to prefer the former, finding its gameplay to be a lot more exciting than what's on offer in the original.

As is the case in Blade Ball , there are plenty of Death Ball codes that players can redeem for free Gems and other great rewards. Roblox players should be sure to redeem these codes as soon as possible though, as the game is updated often, which can lead to codes expiring at a moment's notice.

Updated December 21, 2024, by Tom Bowen: Despite there being no new updates for the best part of a year now, Death Ball remains incredibly popular with Roblox players. There's still a rather large demand for new Death Ball codes too, although it's one that the gane's developers don't seem too eager to fulfill. To avoid missing out if and when Sub and the rest of the team do decide to drop some, fans of the game should bookmark this page and check back here often, as we're always on the lookout for new codes for Death Ball and will add any that we find to the list below.

All Death Ball Codes

Working Death Ball Codes

  • jiro - Redeem this code for 4,000 Gems
  • xmas - Redeem this code for 4,000 Gems

Expired Death Ball Codes

  • 100mil
  • derank
  • mech
  • newyear
  • divine
  • foxuro
  • kameki
  • thankspity
  • launch
  • sorrygems
  • spirit

How to Redeem Codes for Death Ball

The process for redeeming Death Ball codes is relatively straightforward and not too dissimilar from redeeming codes in other Roblox games. However, those having trouble can refer to the step-by-step instructions below to help speed up the process.

  1. Launch Death Ball .
  2. Press the "More" button at the top of the screen.
  3. Select "Codes" from the drop-down menu.
  4. Type or paste the code into the box provided and then press "Verify". Alternatively, players can just hit enter.

Where to Find More Death Ball Codes

Players can find new codes for Death Ball in a few different places. For starters, it's a good idea to join the game's official Discord server, both for new codes and information about the game. Players should also follow Sub on Twitter, as they sometimes tweet about the game. However, the best place to find new Death Ball codes is arguably right here, as this guide will be updated regularly as and when new codes become available. As such, it's a good idea to bookmark this page and check back here often so as to avoid missing out on future freebies.

FAQ

Q: What is the newest code in Death Ball?

The newest Death Ball code is jiro , which can be redeemed for 4,000 Gems.
